name: Walk Through The Portal
description:
The narrator will tell all you need to know :)

Move with WASD or Arrow Keys

Authors: 

https://itch.io/profile/jonchomsky - Audio Programmer & Narrator

Myself - General Programmer & Level Designer

Game made for Weekly Game Jam

Using free Snap Asset pack models - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/templates/packs/snaps-prototype-sci-fi-industrial-136759
